main event: Witness saw 4 glowing objects flying rapidly downward, which hovered briefly and then climbed out of sight.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on February 23, 1958., The objects were described as glowing., The objects flew at a very rapid speed., The witness reported hovering behavior before the objects ascended., The report is part of the Project Blue Book archive.
sighted object: four glowing objects in the sky
witness description: The report indicates a single witness but does not provide further details about their identity.
